name: A Night To Dismember
description:
Test version for our new zombie game

Kill humans to convert them to your horde and destroy marked buildings to increase your score and become the ultimate zombie master 

Controls:

WASD for Movement.

Q and E to rotate camera

LMB: Melee

RMB: Target enemy (makes all your zombies focus on an enemy or building)

1-4: Other abilities

Feedback form: https://forms.gle/d8xsBhU2u5ZBUspJA

Noted: WebGL version has oversized cursor currently and other missing features, play the downloadable version for the best experience
